verses.verse: And all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> and cried; <S%H5414><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night. <S%H3915><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron: <S%H175><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Would God that <S%H3863><s%> we had died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt! <S%H4714><s%> or <S%H176><s%> would God <S%H3863><s%> we had died <S%H4191><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness! <S%H4057><s%>

And wherefore <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> us unto <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> that our wives <S%H802><s%> and our children <S%H2945><s%> should be <S%H1961><s%> a prey? <S%H957><s%> were it not <S%H3808><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> for us to return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>
And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> Let us make <S%H5414><s%> a captain, <S%H7218><s%> and let us return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> which were of <S%H4480><s%> them that searched <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> their clothes: <S%H899><s%>

And they spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we passed through <S%H5674><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> it, is an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delight <S%H2654><s%> in us, then he will bring <S%H935><s%> us into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> it us; a land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> rebel <S%H4775><s%> not <S%H408><s%> ye against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are bread <S%H3899><s%> for us: their defense <S%H6738><s%> is departed <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> us: fear <S%H3372><s%> them not. <S%H408><s%>

But all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> bade <S%H559><s%> stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones. <S%H68><s%> And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H575><s%> will this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> provoke <S%H5006><s%> me? and how long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H575><s%> will it be ere <S%H3808><s%> they believe <S%H539><s%> me, for all <S%H3605><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have showed <S%H6213><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them?

I will smite <S%H5221><s%> them with the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and disinherit <S%H3423><s%> them, and will make <S%H6213><s%> of thee a greater <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> it, (for <S%H3588><s%> thou broughtest up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> in thy might <S%H3581><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> them;)

And they will tell <S%H559><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> for they have heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> art among <S%H7130><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> art seen <S%H7200><s%> face <S%H5869><s%> to face, <S%H5869><s%> and that thy cloud <S%H6051><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, and that thou <S%H859><s%> goest <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, by day time <S%H3119><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

Now if thou shalt kill <S%H4191><s%> all <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> then the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fame <S%H8088><s%> of thee will speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1115><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto them therefore he hath slain <S%H7819><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> I beseech thee, <S%H4994><s%> let the power <S%H3581><s%> of my Lord <S%H136><s%> be great, <S%H1431><s%> according as <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is longsuffering, <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%> and of great <S%H7227><s%> mercy, <S%H2617><s%> forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression, <S%H6588><s%> and by no means clearing <S%H5352><s%> <S%H5352><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the guilty, visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation.

Pardon, <S%H5545><s%> I beseech thee, <S%H4994><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> according unto the greatness <S%H1433><s%> of thy mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and as <S%H834><s%> thou hast forgiven <S%H5375><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> from Egypt <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H2008><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I have pardoned <S%H5545><s%> according to thy word: <S%H1697><s%>

But as truly <S%H199><s%> as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those men <S%H376><s%> which have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> my glory, <S%H3519><s%> and my miracles, <S%H226><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and have tempted <S%H5254><s%> me now these <S%H2088><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and have not <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice; <S%H6963><s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> they shall not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers, <S%H1><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any <S%H3605><s%> of them that provoked <S%H5006><s%> me see <S%H7200><s%> it:

But my servant <S%H5650><s%> Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> he had <S%H1961><s%> another <S%H312><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, and hath followed me fully, <S%H4390><s%> <S%H310><s%> him will I bring <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whereinto <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he went; <S%H935><s%> and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

(Now the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the valley.) <S%H6010><s%> Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and get <S%H5265><s%> you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall I bear with this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> which <S%H834><s%> murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me? I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, As truly as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as <S%H834><s%> ye have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in mine ears, <S%H241><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> to you:

Your carcasses <S%H6297><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of you, according to your whole <S%H3605><s%> number, <S%H4557><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me,

Doubtless <S%H518><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> concerning which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to make you dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein, save <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>

But your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye said <S%H559><s%> should be <S%H1961><s%> a prey, <S%H957><s%> them will I bring in, <S%H935><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye have despised. <S%H3988><s%>
But as for you, <S%H859><s%> your carcasses, <S%H6297><s%> they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And your children <S%H1121><s%> shall wander <S%H1961><s%> <S%H7462><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> your whoredoms, <S%H2184><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> your carcasses <S%H6297><s%> be wasted <S%H8552><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

After the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> ye searched <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> even forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> each day for a year, <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%> shall ye bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> even forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> my breach of promise. <S%H8569><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have said, <S%H1696><s%> I will surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H2063><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me: in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%> they shall be consumed, <S%H8552><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

And the men, <S%H376><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> who returned, <S%H7725><s%> and made <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, by bringing up <S%H3318><s%> a slander <S%H1681><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%>

Even those men <S%H376><s%> that did bring up <S%H3318><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> upon the land, <S%H776><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> which were of <S%H4480><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> still.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> sayings <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>

And they rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and got them up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> we be here, and will go up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath promised: <S%H559><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> we have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> now <S%H2088><s%> do ye <S%H859><s%> transgress <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> but it <S%H1931><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> prosper. <S%H6743><s%>

Go not up, <S%H5927><s%> <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is not <S%H369><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you; that ye be not <S%H3808><s%> smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> are there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and ye shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> ye are turned away <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you.

But they presumed <S%H6075><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> top: <S%H7218><s%> nevertheless the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> departed <S%H4185><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

Then the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> came down, <S%H3381><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> hill, <S%H2022><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and discomfited <S%H3807><s%> them, even unto <S%H5704><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>
